name: No Signal Game
description:
This game was made for the GDA jam.

The game is about a pixel who have to kill all red nodes that are making the tv losing signal.

esc- to escape the game

The development of this game was hard and I had a lot of trobles. I know this ain't my best work but I'm still proud of what I did because it's the first time I try to make Unity crash. But luckyly the game is playable. I know it's ad but it's what I have.
